original_title: 8 Bit: A Documentary about Art and Videogames
overview: 8 BIT is a hybrid documentary examining the influence of video games on contemporary culture.  A mélange of a rocumentary, art expose and a culture-critical investigation, 8 BIT ties together seemingly disconnected phenomena like the 80’s demo scene, chiptune music and contemporary artists using machinima and modified games.  Produced in NYC, LA, Paris and Tokyo, 8 BIT brings a global perspective on the new artistic approaches of the DIY generation which grew up playing Atari and Commodore 64.  8 BIT insists that in the 21st century Game-Boy rock, machinima and game theory belong together and share a common root: the digital heritage of Generation X.
title: 8 Bit: A Documentary about Art and Videogames
